define: This API creates a shipping document job for selected documents. The system receives requests and returns a job ID along with success and failure details.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The type of shipping document. Available values: THERMAL_UNPACKAGED_LABEL

","name":"shipping_document_type","sample":"THERMAL_UNPACKAGED_LABEL","type":"string","required":"True","key":"TkfShzF"},{"description":"

List of Unpackaged SKUs to generate labels for.

","name":"unpackaged_sku_requests","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"False","key":"NytiBP","children":[{"description":"

Unpackaged SKU ID of the model.

","name":"unpackaged_sku_id","sample":"844091087_11192347","type":"string","required":"False","key":"MzDrEYP"},{"description":"

Number of copies for the generated labels (maximum 600 total across all requested SKUs).

","name":"quantity","sample":"10","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"EFtHKHs"}]}],"response_params":[{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"5551ce8db5314c70a362dfe33544f074","description":"

The identifier of the API request for error tracking.

","key":"HBRpMDD"},{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"error_auth","type":"string","required":null,"key":"QxYpzGf"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Invalid access_token","type":"string","required":null,"key":"HEWHeb"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"ciitpTf","children":[{"description":"

Generated Job ID which will be used for status tracking and download the Shipping Document

","name":"job_id","sample":"SDK0001_a86148a97a6e04ce2ed468968de344b7","type":"string","required":null,"key":"scEhhrx"},{"description":"

List Package Id or Unpackaged Id that succeeds in generating Shipping Document

","name":"success_id_list","sample":"[\"844091087_11192347\"]","type":"string[]","required":null,"key":"eMrPBYe"},{"description":"

List Packages or Unpackaged that failed in generating Shipping Document

","name":"fail_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"pPeKJcn","children":[{"description":"

Package Id or Unpackaged Id that failed in generating Shipping Document

","name":"id","sample":"844091087_11192342","type":"string","required":null,"key":"zMpGHdS"},{"description":"

Indicate error type if one element hit error.

","name":"fail_error","sample":"error_param","type":"string","required":null,"key":"KKjSsCH"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if one element hit error.

","name":"fail_message","sample":"Wrong parameters, detail: This Unpackaged SKU ID is not eligible for printing. Reason: Invalid SKU ID.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"bdTNRBN"}]}]}]}
